title: Centralize typography with semantic CSS classes
description:
Refactor font sizes and weights into centralized semantic utility classes to make typography changes easier to maintain.

Previously, font size and weight changes required updating classes scattered across 10+ component files. This feature consolidates typography into 13 semantic classes defined in globals.css.

Implementation includes:
- 13 semantic typography classes (text-title, text-subtitle, text-target, text-cta, etc.)
- Responsive sizes via CSS media queries (@media min-width: 768px)
- Removal of redundant font-family declarations
- Consistency fix: home page title now bold like other page titles

Files modified: globals.css + 8 game components
All changes purely visual - no functional changes.
close_reason: Completed: All 13 semantic typography classes implemented in globals.css and applied across 9 component files. Build passes clean. Changes pushed to main (commit d3eaca6).
